title: Better AP bruiser itemization/runes?
body: Champs like {{champion:27}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:68}} Dont really have good runes or itemization for them... I know they have {{item:3116}}  and  {{item:3151}}  but they could use something similar to conqueror and {{item:3748}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3071}} and {{item:3053}}

replies.body: Slightly different than what the OP is going for, but I rather like to take squishier champs ({{champion:432}} and {{champion:43}} especially) and build them more offtank to focus more on CC/sustain at the expense of damage/healing/shielding. There's a similar itemization and rune gap for those types, too. With the old rune system it was much more open such that you could stack Armor/MR runes. The new rune system and weak tank items has really hurt the playstyle.

This too. There really needs to be more rune options.

Phase Rush/Arcane Comet/Electrocute/Unsealed Spellbook these work decently on Rumble and Morde.

Just about anything works on Singed.

> 
> Just about anything works on Singed.

I cant speak for rumble, but I see him(and Morde) take Aery a lot, which is supposed to be a support keystone.

Morde does okay with phase rush(SRS was much better for him) and electrocute but they are a little iffy to proc sometimes because of the 3 hit condition and the fact that his auto and q don't count as different spells. It's hard to proc these runes on targets that he would want to run these against because he has a hard time getting in melee range of ranged squishies. Unsealed spellbook is also not good on Morde because he needs more damage or tankiness to win against other bruisers like Darius.
